content:
# I have successfully gathered 5 units of stone, which allows me to craft a stone furnace. 

# Now, I will proceed to craft the stone furnace using the materials I have:
# - 5 stone
# - 1 iron plate (which I have plenty of)

# Crafting the stone furnace now.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Crafting one stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying updated inventory after crafting the stone furnace.
